name: Jamster Revival
description: Jamster offers you ringtones, dial tones, mobile games, screensavers and music for your mobile phones. Massive selection only here at Jamster.

shortcuts.name: Ringtones
shortcuts.description: Only at Jamster will you find the huge selection of ringtones. Get your realtones, polyphonic ringtones and dial tones for your mobile phone.

shortcuts.name: Games
shortcuts.description: Only at Jamster will you find the huge selection of games. Get your videogames for your mobile phone.

shortcuts.name: Apps
shortcuts.description: Only at Jamster will you find the huge selection of apps. Get your apps for your mobile phone.

shortcuts.name: Graphics
shortcuts.description: Discover a huge selection of graphics only at Jamster, Get your wallpapers and screensavers for your mobile phone.
